comments.body: Is List/Watch working for tpr client? I guess they are since the controller needs them but i don't understand why they are working. List/Watch are using the global scheme/codec, see this [line](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/blob/master/staging/src/k8s.io/client-go/kubernetes/typed/core/v1/pod.go#L156), not the scheme constructed here. I thought the global scheme/codec would complain not recognizing the tpr groupVersionKind.
Nevermind, the apimachinery code is very tolerant for unversioned Kind (ListOptions is registered as one) and thus there is no error.
@caesarxuchao yeah, looks like there were some changes recently, it was breaking before but works fine now, at least for the code used in the example.
